draw.overall_supervision_plan: I assess the overall initial risk to be medium as a result of an unlikely probability of a catastrophic event; I assess the overall residual risk to be low due to an unlikely probability of a critical event.Most Dangerous Risk: Night MovementsMitigation: Ensure proper NVG care and serviceability before leaving for the field. Control the movement pace and provide clear route briefings to ensure leaders can all track progress during the movement. In case of difficult terrain, use appropriate lights and leader presenceMost Likely Risk: Slips, Trips, and Falls with Heavy EquipmentMitigation: Ensuring proper PPE is worn during operations and slowing down any nonessential movement to ensure soldiers move heavy equipment through the woods. Part of the mitigation will be to brief about weather conditions and empower soldiers to modify any surface deem unsafe before and during the training event. Moving a controlled rate in order to prevent slips, trips ,and fall.
